system.description: You contact a particular creature with which you are familiar and send a short message of twenty-five words or less. The subject can answer in like manner immediately. No matter where the subject is, the message goes to it. The subject can answer even if it is asleep or unconscious. Creatures in other planes receive the message but cannot answer.

components.materialDescription: Fine copper wire. Focus: a small piece of the recipient or something the recipient once carried.
